title: Intuitive Machines Sets November for Launch of IM-1 Lunar Lander
summary: Intuitive Machines announced today that its first lunar landing mission is set for launch between November 15-20, 2023. IM-1 will land at the Moon’s South Pole as part of NASA’s […]

title: Intuitive Machines sets mid-November launch date for first lunar lander
summary: Intuitive Machines offered a clearer projection of when its first lunar lander mission will launch while also giving a cloudier forecast of its finances.

title: AST SpaceMobile fully funds first five commercial direct-to-device satellites
summary: AST SpaceMobile has fully funded its first five commercial satellites slated to launch with SpaceX early next year after raising $115 million in debt, the low Earth orbit direct-to-device startup said Aug. 14.

title: NASA developing larger cubesat payload adapter for SLS
summary: NASA is developing a larger payload adapter for cubesats flying on the next version of the Space Launch System, although it’s unclear if upcoming SLS launches will carry any such secondary payloads.

title: Intelsat meets conditions for $3.7 billion C-band clearing payout
summary: Intelsat said Aug. 14 it is due for a $3.7 billion windfall late this year after becoming the latest satellite operator to clear C-band spectrum ahead of schedule for terrestrial 5G telcos in the United States.
